Game: Ultimate Mortal Kombat Trilogy 2014-03-30T00:00:00-07:00 This is a hack by KABAL_MK of Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 for the Sega Genesis. It adds nearly all playable characters from the Genesis/MegaDrive versions of Mortal Kombat 1, 2, and 3 -including the absent Sheeva, and also adds new backgrounds, specials, combos, finishing moves, and missing audio samples. 2 <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/0c55bdf3-7ef4-4cc2-8109-2ea607520098.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/c73c38dc-b9d8-4401-8548-79677ddc296a.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/a829e74a-77e1-4fd5-b73d-20eacef5f65a.png Fighting KABAL_MK KABAL_MK
